item.title: EP 222 - Is 5G tech A Weapon Against Aliens?
item.itunes:title: Is 5G tech A Weapon Against Aliens?
item.description:
Today we visit the only recorded haunting in Oakland, then we explore the bizarre path of 5G conspiracies!

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Wheeler And Hallford Building, Oakland CA

https://books.google.com/books?id=kAK1p91zJEwC&pg=PA61&lpg=PA61&dq=wheeler+and+hallford+building+haunted&source=bl&ots=u3Wn5GBaBl&sig=ACfU3U1wLdHHcUWIj-yJoOC2OXAEkkAifA&hl=en&sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwjXhKOxgqbiAhUNsZ4KHZ3YC_cQ6AEwBHoECAkQAQ#v=onepage&q=wheeler%20and%20hallford%20building%20haunted&f=false

 

Obituary: Dr. Arthur Hastings

https://www.parapsych.org/articles/0/206/obituary_dr_arthur_hastings.aspx

 

Is 5G A CIA Plot?

https://www.forbes.com/sites/simonrockman1/2018/09/18/is-5g-a-cia-plot/#3a94ad661207

 

Suicide fear over 'weapons grade' technology being tested in Cornwall

https://www.cornwalllive.com/news/cornwall-news/suicide-fear-over-weapons-grade-2122056

 

5G network actually a defensive weapon

https://cairnsnews.org/2018/12/18/5g-network-actually-a-defensive-weapon/

 

MAJOR ANOUNCEMENT, CHANGES ON THE EARTH LIKE YOU’VE NEVER SEEN

https://forbiddenknowledgetv.net/clif-high-major-anouncement-changes-on-the-earth-like-youve-never-seen/

 

Major Announcement, Changes on the Earth Like You've Never Seen

https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=4&v=XE5I6acdPD0

 

Web Bot

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Web_Bot

 

Various Resources

https://eluxemagazine.com/magazine/dangers-of-5g/

https://www.windowscentral.com/how-microsofts-big-bets-5g-may-be-bad-your-health

https://www.cbsnews.com/news/5g-network-cell-towers-raise-health-concerns-for-some-residents/

https://www.fda.gov/Radiation-EmittingProducts/RadiationEmittingProductsandProcedures/HomeBusinessandEntertainment/CellPhones/ucm116282.htm

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC5504984/

https://warosu.org/sci/thread/S10176724

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kBsUWbUB6PE

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7i-Ki5dFXdI

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gIxGjKuKOU8

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ljLynbr5iPc

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lBbY8fvTidU

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/23802593

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/26300312

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/29573716

http://cyrusfarivar.com/docs/WiFi%20Health/EBBE-review.pdf

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/1482415

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8388394

http://www.mediafire.com/folder/dj875cd10yb72/EMF

https://ntrs.nasa.gov/archive/nasa/casi.ntrs.nasa.gov/19810017132.pdf

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/9261543

https://ecfsapi.fcc.gov/file/7521096402.pdf

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/29667447

https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/22428084

 

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

"As Above" Art By Grant Scott

 

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable
